intent_atoms.description: Integrate NavigationSplitViewKit as a foundational dependency for FoundationUI's navigation architecture modernization.
NavigationSplitViewKit dependency added to Package.swift with version ≥1.0.0.
Dependency mirrored in Project.swift (Tuist) with same version constraint.
CI workflows updated to cache the SPM dependency and invalidate on Package.resolved changes.
Documentation updated: README.md and BUILD.md include a dependencies section listing NavigationSplitViewKit.
SPM and Tuist configurations must use identical version constraints for NavigationSplitViewKit to ensure consistent dependency resolution.
Use semantic versioning with .from("1.0.0") to pin major version 1.x of NavigationSplitViewKit, preventing breaking changes from major bumps.
Cache SPM dependencies in CI using actions/cache keyed on hash of Package.resolved for reproducible builds and performance.
